fr.B4D.building.bank

Class Bank

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.B4D.building.Building
      • fr.B4D.building.IndoorBuilding
        • fr.B4D.building.bank.Bank

  • public class Bank
extends IndoorBuilding
    The class Bank represents a bank on the map.

    This class extends IndoorBuilding. A bank has a banker position.

        Builder of the Bank class.
        Parameters:
        position - - Position of the bank on the map.
        inPoints - - List of points to get into the building.
        outPoints - - List of points to get out of the building.
        bankerPosition - - Position of the banker on the screen.
